+def inserir(self, grafite_novo: Grafite):%0A        if self.ponta is not None:%0A            print(%22fail: ja existe grafite%22)%0A            return%0A%0A        if self.grossura != grafite_novo.grossura:%0A            print(%22fail: calibre incompativel%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        self.ponta = grafite_novo%0A%0A    def remover(self):%0A        if self.ponta is None:%0A            print(%22fail: nao existe grafite%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        self.ponta = None%0A        %0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str:%0A        ponta_str = str(self.ponta) if self.ponta is not None else %22null%22%0A        return f%22calibre: %7Bself.grossura%7D, grafite: %7Bponta_str%7D%22%0A%0A    def escrever(self):%0A        if self.ponta is None:%0A            print(%22fail: nao existe grafite%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        if self.ponta.tamanho %3C= 10:%0A            print(%22fail: tamanho insuficiente%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        gasto = self.ponta.GastoPorFolha()%0A        %0A        if gasto == 0:%0A            print(%22fail: dureza invalida, nao gasta%22)%0A            return%0A%0A        tamanho_final = self.ponta.tamanho - gasto%0A%0A        if tamanho_final %3C 10:%0A            self.ponta.tamanho = 10%0A            print(%22fail: folha incompleta%22)%0A        else:%0A            self.ponta.tamanho = tamanho_final%0A%0A%0Adef main():%0A    lapiseira = None%0A%0A    while True:%0A        linha = input()%0A        command = linha.split()%0A        %0A        print(f%22$%7Blinha%7D%22)%0A%0A%0A        op = command%5B0%5D%0A        %0A        if op == 'end':%0A            break%0A        %0A        elif op == 'init':%0A            lapiseira = Lapiseira(float(command%5B1%5D))%0A        %0A        elif lapiseira is None and op not in %5B'end', 'init'%5D:%0A            print(%22fail: lapiseira nao foi iniciada%22)%0A            continue%0A        %0A        elif op == 'insert':%0A            grafite = Grafite(float(command%5B1%5D), command%5B2%5D, int(command%5B3%5D))%0A            lapiseira.inserir(grafite)%0A        %0A        elif op == 'remove':%0A            lapiseira.remover()%0A%0A        elif op == 'write':%0A            paginas = 1%0A            if len(command) %3E 1:%0A                paginas = int(command%5B1%5D)%0A            %0A            for _ in range(paginas):%0A                lapiseira.escrever()%0A%0A        elif op == 'show':%0A            print(lapiseira)%0A
